page.title: 07EDUCATION School Day
page.content:
{ A Day In My Life At School.}
On the morning of Tuesday,July 2nd 1985 I got ready for school.I collected my swimming gear, my coat, my lunch and then I set off.When I arrived at school I hung up my coat and bags in the cloakroom and walked into the classroom.After a while it was time to sit down so I did! Mrs.Robertson who is my teacher called the register,we got out our hymn books and went into assembly in Classroom 2 where all the tables and chairs had been moved out of the way as usual.It was hymn practice so we sang a few of our favourite hymns and then went back to our rooms. We did maths until break at 10.30 and afterwards carried on with our Domesday project. At 11.50 we went for lunch in the New school hall then we went out to play.
